CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the solvent was changed from DCB to TCB , the photovoltaic performance could be further improved.

Let's think step by step.

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. DCB (4-iodo-7-octyl-1H-benzotriazole)
2. TCB (4-tert-butyl-7-octyl-1H-benzotriazole)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. TCB (4-tert-butyl-7-octyl-1H-benzotriazole)

The entity "DCB" is not a Material Name, it's a chemical compound.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| TCB (4-tert-butyl-7-octyl-1H-benzotriazole) |
